## DurableOperation.isWaitForCallback() method

Checks if this operation is a wait-for-callback operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isWaitForCallback(): boolean;
```

**Returns:**

boolean

True if this is a wait-for-callback operation, false otherwise
